scripts.pre-push: bun run lint && bun run build
scripts.validate: bun run type-check && bun run lint && bun run prettier
scripts.rename:kebab-files: find . -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' | grep -v node_modules | grep -v .next | grep -v .git | while read file; do newname=$(echo "$file" | sed 's/\([A-Z]\)/-\L\1/g' | sed 's/^-//' | sed 's/\/-/-/g'); [ "$file" != "$newname" ] && mv "$file" "$newname" 2>/dev/null || true; done
scripts.rename:kebab-dirs: find . -type d \( -path './node_modules' -o -path './.next' -o -path './.git' \) -prune -o -type d -print | grep -E '[A-Z]' | sort -r | while read dir; do newdir=$(echo "$dir" | sed 's|/\([A-Z]\)|/-\L\1|g' | sed 's|^-||' | sed 's|/-|/|g'); [ "$dir" != "$newdir" ] && mv "$dir" "$newdir" 2>/dev/null || true; done
scripts.rename:kebab-all: npm run rename:kebab-dirs && npm run rename:kebab-files
scripts.imports:check: eslint . --no-fix --rule 'no-restricted-imports: [error, { patterns: [{ group: [../*], message: Use absolute imports with @/ instead of relative parent imports (../) }] }]'
scripts.check-all: npm run lint && npm run format
